Title: Episode 4
Plot: Pasha's party girl lifestyle takes its toll; Azeem attempts at making friends don't go to plan; Jo is losing her grip as her feelings for Tracey get stronger; Georgie's maternal instincts kick in; and Linda is ashamed of her artistic endeavours.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual themes and disturbing behaviour
GuestStars: Gillian Baxter, Fred Bishop, Harry Calder, Fiona Edgar, Patrick Flavell, Rachel House, Renee Lyons, Rose McIver, Yvette Parsons, Edith Poor, Nikki Siulepa, Calvin Tuteao, Jessica Joy Wood, Shadow
